step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on the circular motion. Ensure your elbows and wrists are also moving naturally with the roll.
Nicely done! You're starting to get the feel for squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to make the movement smooth and continuous.
Great job on the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll your shoulders back to maximize the benefit. Keep up the good work.
Second set, looking good! Focus on maintaining a relaxed posture. Ensure your elbows and wrists are following the shoulder movement smoothly.
Excellent! You're really getting the hang of the backward and downward squeeze. Try to keep the motion fluid and controlled throughout.
Fantastic finish to the second set! You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls. Remember to breathe deeply with each movement for optimal lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth, circular motion. Remember to breathe deeply as you roll your shoulders back to help with lymphatic flow and oxygen. Keep up the excellent work!
